title: Honor level ??
body: I've been stuck in honor level 2 since forever. I rarely get punishments any more - could someone look over my account to see if i've been stopped from getting honor level in general?? I always get honors...

replies.body: I'm stuck honor 0, have been unbanned for over 3 months, and honored in 90% of my games...

> [{quoted}](name=Quinn main,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=xaQjaRwB,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-19T03:50:36.467+0000)
>
> I&#039;ve been stuck in honor level 2 since forever. I rarely get punishments any more - could someone look over my account to see if i&#039;ve been stopped from getting honor level in general?? I always get honors...

I feel the same. Never had any bans at all. I get honor most of the time. But I am still at level 2.
But GF.. She is 3. 
Makes me sad because I play more then her. SADFACE!
{{item:3073}}


Edited 

She is now 4 while I am on 2...
Just don't talk in game, any reports drop your honor level whether they are right or wrong.
